tab1.text1:
Welcome to Ark Survival Ascended: Resurgence! 

Greetings, Survivors! We're thrilled to have you on our Ark server, where the challenges are tough, the adventures are epic, and the community is thriving.

Join Our Discord Community:
 Click the "Discord" button below to join our Discord server! 

In our Discord, you'll find essential information about the server:

Server Rules: Understand the guidelines to ensure a fair and enjoyable experience.
Drop Contents & Rates: Learn about the loot you'll encounter and the rates that shape your journey.
Wipe Announcements: Get notified of upcoming wipes and stay ahead of the game!
 
Unlock the In-Game Shop:
 Open your inventory and click the house icon to access our In-Game Shop! 

Discover a variety of kits and shop items to enhance your survival experience. Whether you're a seasoned survivor or a newcomer, our shop offers valuable resources to aid your journey.

Welcome to Ark Survival Ascended: Resurgence! May your adventures be legendary and your survival epic.
